kpa.solvers

Class AbstractSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • kpa.solvers.AbstractSolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BacktrackSolver

    public abstract class AbstractSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for solvers of Kakuro puzzles.

        public java.util.Collection<Command> getCommands()
        Gets the commands whose execution led to current puzzle state.

      • solve

        public abstract boolean solve()
        Either finds one solution of the puzzle from its current state, if solvable, or leaves the puzzle unchanged.
        Returns:
        whether puzzle was solved
        Precondition:
        puzzle != null
        Modifies:
        puzzle
        Postcondition:
        (\result && puzzle.isSolved()) || (! \result && puzzle unchanged)
